ygData.subject: Re: level 20+ warriors?
ygData.msgSnippet: My damage went for 29 to 35 when I hit 20th lvl, but I had a BBC at the time and I think the BBC is gimped below 20th....but now that I m 27th, I hit for 42
ygData.messageBody:
My damage went for 29 to 35 when I hit 20th lvl, but I had a BBC at the time and I think the BBC is gimped below 20th....but now that I'm 27th, I hit for 42 with the same BBC....seems pretty consistant for me, every level I get an extra point of damage woohoo.

Salr D'Taynkk
Dark Warrior of The Kith
Veeshan

>>> "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...> 5.18.99 2:40:14 AM >>>
From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>

Could any level 20+ warriors tell me if the extra damage per level works? If
so how much more damage are you doing with the same weapon than you did at
level 19 and what your strength is?

Just curious. Thanks.
